Title: SmartPart for SharePoint
Description: A SharePoint web part that can host any ASP.NET web user control. Create your web parts by using the VS.NET designer instead of coding everything by hand!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The SharePoint web part which can host any ASP.NET web user control. Create your web parts without writing code!
